result: {"id":"59004d3ab123db260cbe1479","sn":762,"u":1514190711313,"c":1493191994194,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"莎士比亚的书开始难让读者理解","ch":[{"content":"有2个选项"},{"content":"有一个选项是：虽然莎士比亚的 language 很复杂, 但是有很多资料可以解释。所以现代人比较好理解他（她）的language"},{"content":"另一个选项说：现代人 have difficulty 理解莎士比亚的 language"},{"content":"答案是：现代人比较好理解他（她）的 language 的这个选项"}]}

{"id":"59004d1d0ce46300614905ee","sn":761,"u":1514190648831,"c":1493191965224,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"水对动物的重要性","ch":[{"content":"讲水对动物的重要性"},{"content":"大的动物例如大象要喝多少水，它们的皮肤经常变干，所以要在靠近水源的地方居住。"},{"content":"小动物本身身体消耗的水不多，不用喝太多水，而且体型小，所以small animals can live anywhere"}]}

It doesn’t require any background in math; introduced the lecturer of the math lab and his experience, also the math lab will cover different aspects.","ch":[]}

{"id":"59004d9dac502e0063c61276","sn":764,"u":1514190642158,"c":1493192093735,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"努力学习","te":"A professor talks about how to study the course. He said that the students should at least finish one biological course before this one. New concepts are introduced, need to study at least 1 hour a day to keep up. No trick, just study hard.","ch":[]}

{"id":"59004e181b69e60058b4ca5b","sn":766,"u":1514190597593,"c":1493192216112,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"笔记","te":"John slept too long because his alarm didn't work. He missed lecture about globalization. Sally mentioned the lecture is difficult and boring. He appreciates that Sally took notes so he can use. ","ch":[{"content":"一个男的告诉一个女的他错过了有一天的lecture"},{"content":"女生说反正那节课很boring也很难"},{"content":"然后说她记了笔记，可以给男生看，男生表示很感激"}]}

{"id":"59004cd60ce46300614902f4","sn":759,"u":1514190549585,"c":1493191894840,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"喝水","ch":[{"content":"一个人一天喝多少杯和水合适。 "},{"content":"以前都说一天喝八杯水是好的，但这是错误的。"},{"content":"因为很多食物里都含有水分，所以一人每天和四杯水，剩下的从食物中摄取就可以。"}]}

{"id":"59005157570c350058fad14c","sn":780,"u":1514190280874,"c":1493193047065,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"沟通","ch":[{"content":"人类communication大多数是通过body language并非word。"},{"content":"文字只占了6～7%。"},{"content":"讲话的语气和表情占了70%左右。"},{"content":"动物也是，而它们表达得可能更好。"},{"content":"因为它们没别的alternative。"},{"content":"提到了body language只能表达当下的心情，不能传达过去和未来的看法。"}]}

{"id":"59004f961b69e60058b4d491","sn":774,"u":1514190279942,"c":1493192598639,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"Brain development（大脑发育）","ch":[{"content":"说到amygdala and hippocampus。"},{"content":"印象中说hippocampus will be developed later in life。"},{"content":"然后虽然人们会不记得小时候的 emotional experience。"},{"content":"但这些experience will shape the relationship later in our life。"}]}

{"id":"59004dd7570c350058fab46d","sn":765,"u":1514190278849,"c":1493192151958,"p":"HCS","t":"Listening","q":"病毒","te":"After comparing, poliovirus only has RNA, then make a two strands of RNA to reproduce. Retrovirus has RNA, then make a DNA copy to create RNA again, thus called retro. This is basically what the summary says, mainly about their reproduction. ","ch":[{"content":"讲poliovirus和retrovirus, 它们用RNA,还是DNA复制，很多专业词，所以要了解一下背景知识"},{"content":"Polio virus is different from XXX, it doesn’t contain DNA, can absorb protein from the cell… "},{"content":"讲小儿麻痹症病毒的不同，里面没有细胞核nucleus，选有“different”的选项"}]}

"},{"content":"Bolshevik believe that the new established society is equal."},{"content":"Russian revolution有两个阶段"},{"content":"第一个阶段是FEB, 1970"},{"content":"第二个阶段是OCT, 1970"},{"content":"Russian people说他们要成为世界上第一个democratic country"}]}
